entries.title: Fitted Scoop Neck Tee
entries.description: A flattering, feminine fit with a stylish scoop neckline. This versatile T-shirt is a must-have for any casual outfit.

entries.title: Relaxed Boyfriend Tee
entries.description: Embrace comfort with our relaxed-fit boyfriend tee. Perfect for a laid-back, effortlessly cool look.

entries.title: Cropped Graphic T-Shirt
entries.description: Make a statement with our trendy cropped graphic tee. Features eye-catching designs for a bold, youthful style.

entries.title: Soft Jersey V-Neck Tee
entries.description: Experience ultimate comfort with our soft jersey V-neck. Drapes beautifully for a flattering silhouette.

entries.title: Sleeveless Turtleneck Top
entries.description: A chic, sleeveless turtleneck perfect for layering or wearing alone. Elevates any outfit with its sophisticated design.

entries.title: Organic Cotton Pocket Tee
entries.description: Combine style and sustainability with our organic cotton pocket tee. Features a small chest pocket for added detail.
